AND X.USER_ABSNCE_AT = #{selAbsnceAt}

SELECT A.EMPLYR_ID, A.USER_NM, (CASE WHEN B.USER_ABSNCE_AT IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE B.USER_ABSNCE_AT END) AS USER_ABSNCE_AT, (CASE WHEN B.USER_ABSNCE_AT IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END) AS REG_YN, LAST_UPDUSR_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN COMTNUSERABSNCE B ON A.EMPLYR_ID = B.EMPLYR_ID WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.EMPLYR_ID = #{userId}
